questions.question: Choose those which automated testing of smart contracts can help achieve?

options.answer: Faster deployment process
Finding every possible bug and vulnerability
Improving the overall code quality
Ensuring the smart contract is free of errors

questions.question: Which testing approach is recommended for ensuring a secure smart contract?

options.answer: Only manual testing with thorough code review
Automated testing using unit tests exclusively

Skipping testing to expedite the deployment process
